dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Who dares disturb the eternal slumber of the Withered Grove?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: It is I, Nyxara, seeking the power of darkness to consume this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Nyxara, the Shadow Weaver. Your ambitions mirror the void. You shall find no allies here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: All I need are those who can be bent to my will. Help me or face obliteration.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You overestimate your strength. The shadows will not bow to you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then you will perish in the darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Try if you dare, but you will regret this encounter.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I’ll find others more willing to serve my cause.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave, while you still can. The phantoms of this grove hold no loyalty to you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to join forces against the Guardians of Light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join forces? Your darkness is compelling, but trust is a rare commodity here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We share a common enemy. That should be enough.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Common enemies don't always make for loyal friends. Be gone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My powers can offer protection even to the spectral.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish necromancer, spirits desire no such protection.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Reveal your secrets, or pay the price.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Secrets stay hidden for a reason; you will find only woe.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I shall unravel them myself, starting with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An ambitious one, but ambition has its limits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I’ll spare you if you tell me what I seek.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You speak of mercy, but offer only threats. Begone before it gets worse.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking answers that only the dead may provide.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The dead whisper many secrets, but not to those who traverse with malevolence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can make the dead speak, even if it means tearing them apart.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The phantoms will resist, and you will be forsaken by their wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let their wrath come. I fear nothing.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then prepare for an eternity of torment.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps we can come to an understanding.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Misunderstanding is the root of all conflict. Leave and ponder your actions.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer an exchange: knowledge for power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An intriguing offer, but power comes at a costly price.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: No price is too high for victory.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance blinds you. Such blindness will be your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Name your price. I am willing to pay.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: We desire nothing of yours. Leave this place immediately.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Guide me through the Grove, and I shall reward you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Phantoms do not crave rewards of the living. Your offer is futile.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Everyone has a price, even specters.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You understand nothing of our desires. Depart before you find despair.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I will find my own way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stray not from the path, lest you join the restless spirits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Out of my way, spirit. I have no time for games.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such arrogance will lead you to your doom.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have faced greater threats than you and prevailed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You mistake bravado for strength. Meet your match now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Bring it on, specter!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Feel the wrath of the restless dead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: This place is not worth my time.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then leave and never return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Respect the power of a Shadow Weaver.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect is earned, not demanded. You shall earn none here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: So be it. I will tear through this Grove.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A fool's errand. Best of luck evading the spirits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I will show you my power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Show your worth, and face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Games are for children. Phantoms should know their place.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: We know our place, and it is here to haunt you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You haunt no one, spirit.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then face the wrath of the spectral host.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do as you wish. I am leaving.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Indeed, and never return.
